content.rendered:
Directed by Sakthivel

Star Sakshi Agarwal. Karthick Ashokan (Karthick). Rnr Mahonar. Muthukumar. Riythvika Panneerselvam ((as Riythvika)). Daniel Annie Pope. Sahana Shetty (Pooja). Kaali Venkat. John Vijay

Language Tamil

Producers Karthick Ashokan. Senthil Prabu Nagarajan. Sakthivel

Production Safety Dream Production. Rule Breaker Production. Magic Lantern. Diya Cine Creations
